TopicTitle: Flight logs and low atmosphere unmanned craft.

Articles.Content:
Just a quick 2 suggestions.

flight logs:

All recovered/in progress flights have flight logs. They can be found at motion control and contain the current flight log (like when you crash a flight), science, orbits (near kerbin to LKO, LKO to HKO, HKO to Moon fly by, Ect)

low atmosphere unmanned craft:

I like to deploy rovers from planes but if I don't keep flying in a holding pattern or a loop it despawns before it can paracute to the ground. It would nice to have a way around this like a DNE button on the command pod.
